text: 11|70|avarkalutaiya kaikal atanitam cellatataik kantatum avarkalaip parri cantekittar; avarkalaip parriya payamum avar manatil ucalatiyatu. (Appolutu) avarkal (iprahimai nokki) ‘‘nir payappatatir. Niccayamaka nankal ‘lut'tutaiya makkalitam (avarkalai alittuvita) anuppappattullom'' enru kurinarkal
